title: "OFFICE" Font id
content:
anybody know a font similar or identical to the font used for this vintage sign? thanks in advance,  
danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709011342im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/HotelCalifornia006_3741.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [HotelCalifornia006.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709011342/http:/typophile.com/files/HotelCalifornia006.jpg) | 43.07 KB |

 [‹ Works from Oliver Vaughan](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709011342/http:/www.typophile.com/node/35509 "Go to previous forum topic") [What does Typephile use?? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709011342/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41832 "Go to next forum topic")
author: SKUMATIK

comments.content:
Hi Danny,  
chop off the serifs of its ‘I’, and [Case Study Nº 1](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709011342/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/case-study-no-one-lt/heavy/) will come quite close.  
F
awesome guys thank you both so much!
